thread.section_title: Ocean County Veterinary Hospital Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Ocean County Veterinary Hospital | ocvh.com
thread.title: Eileen
thread.title_full: Ocean County Veterinary Hospital reviewed by Eileen

author: Eileen
title: Eileen
text:
The care provided at OCVH is excellent and complete. The doctors provide knowledgeable and compassionate care regardless of the stage of the animal's life. The doctors call the following day to check on the pet's status following an emergency or surgical procedures. The continuity of care is impressive.
You're greeted by pleasant office staff (also animal lovers). Scheduling is timed so there is little or no wait time and the facility is very clean. The vet assistants are efficient and thorough.
I couldn't be happier with the care afforded my pet and wouldn't hesitate to recommend this veterinary practice to anyone.
